name: Of a Feather (LUDUM DARE 43 COMPO) (v1.1)
description:
To get out of the nest, something must be left behind. Simple puzzle game for Ludum Dare 43, with the theme of sacrifice. 

The only controls needed are the arrow keys, enter can be used to restart. Have fun!

CHANGE LOG:

v1.1 Fixed spawn points to avoid objects getting stuck together while off screen.
